description.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"The Chief of Staff’s Office works on special initiatives for the Superintendent and includes the ombudsperson who investigates and attempts to resolve discrimination complaints (see the ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"entry-hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Ombudsperson","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"3eOi8Jc7thTixOrbtogsiW","type":"Link","linkType":"Entry"}}}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" program for for non-staff expenses). Previously, the Chief of Staff’s Office had a program called Organizational Effectiveness which was eliminated in 2019 and focused on leadership training.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
